product_name: Marmot Alpinist Half-Zip Fleece Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: An extremely efficient and lightweight insulator, the men's Marmot Alpinist Half-Zip Fleece Jacket is easy to stow in a backpack or carry-on for your next big adventure. 100% grid-polyester fleece feels soft against skin and insulates even when wet. Marmot Alpinist Half-Zip Fleece Jacket has a wind flap behind the front zipper to seal out drafts. Zippered chest pocket provides secure storage. Elastic cuffs seal in warmth and thumbholes help extend the coverage over hands. Closeout.
short_description: An extremely efficient and lightweight insulator, the men's Marmot Alpinist Half-Zip Fleece Jacket is easy to stow in a backpack or carry-on for your next big adventure.
